column5: Modern Townhome in EADO - East Downtown brings you within walking distance of Discovery Green Park, Minute Maid Park (Astros), the George R. Brown Convention Center, the Toyota Center (Rockets). With access to the major freeways, major thoroughfares, METRO Transit, and soon METRO Light Rail (LRT) from the East End and Southeast corridors connecting to Downtown and the Main Street Red Line, connectivity to all points of interest in the Houston area is convenient, including NRG stadium.
